name: Incursion (itch) (Baba_T)
description:
Incursion: A game created for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam

Difficulty goes up with time

The Year was 5000

All was well

Until an object came from the Great Beyond,

To rule the laws of our world

It could summon monsters

But grant boons too

Few could master its way

Can you?

Everything besides the music and font was created by me.

Font Credit: Google Fonts

Music Credit:

"Unholy Knight" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
